import React from 'react' const AboutUs = () => (

Welcome to {' '} 7Grim Studios

Driven by
{' '} our love {' '}

for Gaming.

A grass roots game development studio born from our shared passion for gaming. We are a game development studio focused on bringing the games WE have always wanted. Our love letter to the gaming industry, and all involved.

) export default AboutUs
